reviewText: My daughter (now 6) loved these videos as a baby, now our son (10 months) is in love with them! Keeps his attention.
New in case, wrapped in plastic and everything. Perfect condition.
When my son was a toddler and I needed a break from the constant little boy energy, this was perfect! He loved to sit and watch for a half hour!

Curious Buddies is a super musical dvd that encourages toddlers to participate and is easy to follow. My son loved as an infant and this video is always the chosen one even as a toddler . Great 5 stars
My daughter loves this movie, and the songs and show aren't that bad. Shows a lot of farm animals and it is a great mixture between farm animals and puppets! It is great for the little ones!

The songs on these DVDs are fun and catchy, smart and relatable. My son and I both love to sing and dance around the room and do the motions to all the songs! The puppets are just plain cute, from their appearance to their giggles! All the Curious Buddies episodes have been appealing to my son...and me! Plus, we love Jack's Big Music Show, from the same creators and producers. Way to go, Spiffy Pictures!! We only wish there was more where that came from!!

My 14 month old son doesn't really like too many tv shows.  However, he loves the Curious Buddies.  He laughs and claps as soon as the show starts.  He will sit and watch the entire show if I let him.  I would recommend this gift set to anyone with kids between the ages of 1 and 3.
